2023051511410485.title: Doing Business with the Government of Canada
2023051511410485.description:
The Government of Canada purchases $22 billion of goods and services each year. This two-hour webinar provides key information about how to sell to the Government of Canada that will help you learn how to:

  • Find out whether the Government of Canada buys your goods or service
  • Understand the contracting process
  • Register in supplier databases
  • Build networks and promote your business
  • Search for opportunities
  • Take advantage of the procurement information on Buyandsell.gc.ca
  • Understand the security clearance process
  • Bid on opportunities
2023051511410485.locations: Canada-wide, British Columbia, National Capital Region - NCR, Newfoundland and Labrador
2023051511410485.tags: title_doingbusinesswiththegovernmentofcanada timezone_nst city_toronto id_2023051511410485 month_may year_2023 language_english language_french language_bilingual delivery_in-person delivery_online location_canada-wide location_britishcolumbia location_nationalcapitalregion-ncr location_newfoundlandandlabrador

4324222232432.title: Ask Us Anything
4324222232432.description:
Virtual drop-in sessions to meet specialists from Procurement Assistance Canada.
It’s 2023 and we are back with our new series of Ask PAC Anything!

Join for a few minutes, or stay for the whole session, to ask questions on ‘Doing Business with the Government of Canada’

• Drop in for information nuggets related to procurement,
• Ask questions on how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada,
• Learn about tools, resources, and innovative funding programs,
• Pick up tips on finding opportunities, bidding best practices, and more!
• Share about your business and supply capabilities so we can help you find opportunities and programs of interest!

No matter your level of experience, if you have lots of questions, or prefer to listen to the answers; these casual drop-in sessions are for you!

Pick one Friday, or many, and learn more about federal procurement!
See you soon!
4324222232432.registrationStatus: Registration for this event has closed.
